translation.en: Leave! Vacate the premises! Take your ax and get out!
translation.ja: 出てけ　オノを持って早く！

translation.en: And who are you?
translation.ja: あんた 誰だ？

translation.en: I'm the Lorax! Guardian of the forest.
translation.ja: やめろ　わしはロラックス 森の番人じゃ

translation.en: I speak for the trees.
translation.ja: 木の代弁者さ

translation.en: So you're telling me, you just didn't see me magically appear out of that stump?
translation.ja: 切り株から現れるとこ見なかったんか？

translation.en: With all the lightning and thunder and stuff. You didn't see any of that?
translation.ja: 稲妻や雷鳴でハデだったのに？

translation.en: No, but that sounds amazing. Can I see some of that?
translation.ja: カッコいいね　やって見せて

translation.en: Uh, yeah, I could show you. But that's not how it works.
translation.ja: 構わんがそういうもんじゃない

translation.en: Okay. Um...
translation.ja: それじゃ―

translation.en: Didn't really happen.
translation.ja: 信じない

translation.en: Oh, I know what you want!
translation.ja: そっか　あれが欲しいんだ

translation.en: I've got one of these for the cutest little guy I ever saw!
translation.ja: あるよ　マシュマロ 世界一 キュートなおチビさんに あげよう

translation.en: Yummy, yummy, yummy, yummy, yummy...
translation.ja: ムシャムシャ お食べ

translation.en: How dare you! Give me that!
translation.ja: バカにしおって よこせ

translation.en: I'm going to eat this, but I am highly offended by it.
translation.ja: これは食うだが気分を害した

translation.en: What are you... Hey, Mustache! Will you stop that?
translation.ja: おじさん　やめろ

translation.en: What's your deal, man?
translation.ja: 何が望みだ？ 出てけ　ひょろ長！

translation.en: Time for you to go, Beanpole! Pull them right out.
translation.ja: 出てけ　ひょろ長！

translation.en: Stop right there! Stop it!
translation.ja: 待て！

translation.en: So you would hammer one of nature's innocent creatures?
translation.ja: 槌(つち)で打ち込む気か　何の― 罪もない生き物を

translation.en: What? No!
translation.ja: まさか　そんな小さい子を

translation.en: I would never hit this little guy. You, on the other hand,
translation.ja: まさか　そんな小さい子を でも ヒゲ面(づら)のチビは喜んで打ち込む

translation.en: I would gladly pound you and your mustache into the ground!
translation.ja: でも ヒゲ面(づら)のチビは喜んで打ち込む

translation.en: Behold! The intruder and his violent ways.
translation.ja: 見たか 侵入者の乱暴な振る舞いを

translation.en: Shame on you. For shame!
translation.ja: 恥を知れ　この恥知らず

translation.en: All right, you know what? That's it!
translation.ja: もう ここまでだ

translation.en: You listen to me, you furry meatloaf.
translation.ja: 聞け　毛むくじゃら

translation.en: I'm going to chop down as many trees as I need. Okay?
translation.ja: 僕は何本でも伐る

translation.en: Newsflash! Not going anywhere!
translation.ja: 絶対に出ていかないぞ

translation.en: End of story.
translation.ja: 以上だ　あばよ！

translation.en: Then you leave me no choice.
translation.ja: 仕方あるまい

translation.en: If you're not gone by the time the sun sets on this valley,
translation.ja: 日没までに この谷を出ていかなければ―

translation.en: all the forces of nature will be unleashed upon you
translation.ja: お前に向けてあらゆる災いを起こす

translation.en: and curse you until the end of your days!
translation.ja: お前は死ぬまで呪われるだろう

translation.en: You have been warned.
translation.ja: 確かに警告したからな

translation.en: Thanks. Yeah, okay.
translation.ja: どうも

translation.en: You have been warned.
translation.ja: 警告したからな

translation.en: But I didn't listen to his warning.
translation.ja: だが私は無視した

translation.en: And you won't believe what happened that night. What?
translation.ja: すると その夜恐ろしいことが…

translation.en: If you want to hear more, come back tomorrow.
translation.ja: 続きは明日だ

translation.en: Hey, wait, wait! Tomorrow? Whoa!
translation.ja: 待って　明日？

translation.en: Are you serious right now?
translation.ja: 今の本気？

translation.en: Ah! You live in the middle of nowhere!
translation.ja: こんな荒れ地

translation.en: It stinks out here. Don't make me come back!
translation.ja: 臭いし もう来たくない

translation.en: I guess you don't really want to hear the rest of the story.
translation.ja: じゃ 話は終わりだな

translation.en: No, no.
translation.ja: そんな　続きを教えてよ

translation.en: I do. I really do. I want to hear the story. I just...
translation.ja: そんな　続きを教えてよ 必要なんだ

translation.en: Nah! You don't have what it takes. Goodbye.
translation.ja: お前には資格がないあばよ

translation.en: Wait, wait! I have what it takes.
translation.ja: 資格ならあるさ

translation.en: It's all right. It's okay, I'll come back.
translation.ja: オッケー　明日も来るよ

translation.en: It's no problem.
translation.ja: 問題ない

translation.en: See, here I am, leaving. Walking away now.
translation.ja: じゃ 帰るからね 行くよ

translation.en: I'll see you tomorrow.
translation.ja: また明日

translation.en: Maybe. Just maybe.
translation.ja: もしかすると もしかするかも

translation.en: What did you wish for, Audrey?
translation.ja: 願い事は？

translation.en: Well, I would love to tell you,
translation.ja: 教えたいけど―

translation.en: but, sadly, according to the universal wish laws, I cannot. (CHUCKLES)
translation.ja: “願い事の法則”で禁じられてるの

translation.en: TED: I know what she wished for.
translation.ja: 僕は知ってますよ

translation.en: Was it, perhaps...
translation.ja: もしや―

translation.en: This?
translation.ja: これでは？

translation.en: Ted, you didn't.
translation.ja: テッド　ウソでしょ？

translation.en: Oh, no. I totally did.
translation.ja: いいや 本当さお誕生日 おめでとう

translation.en: Happy birthday, Audrey.
translation.ja: 本当さお誕生日 おめでとう オードリー

translation.en: Kiss him! Kiss him! (CHUCKLES)
translation.ja: キスして　キスしてキスして　キスして

translation.en: MRS. WIGGINS: Ted.
translation.ja: テッド！

translation.en: Ted. Tedster. Huh!
translation.ja: テッドったら

translation.en: You're kissing the cereal again, hon. What?
translation.ja: またシリアルの箱にキス？

translation.en: I just... I like this cereal.
translation.ja: これ 好きなんだ

translation.en: What one is this? Yeah!
translation.ja: だよね？　そう！

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: だよね？　そう！ じゃ今度たくさん買っとくわね

translation.en: Well, I'll make sure to buy extra next time for you.
translation.ja: じゃ今度たくさん買っとくわね

translation.en: All right, cool. Hey, I got to run. I got to go do a thing.
translation.ja: オッケー僕 ちょっと走ってくる

translation.en: So, I'll see you guys.
translation.ja: オッケー僕 ちょっと走ってくる じゃあね

translation.en: Whoa! Whoa! Whoa!
translation.ja: じゃあね ちょっと待った出かけちゃダメでしょ

translation.en: You're not going anywhere, young man.
translation.ja: ちょっと待った出かけちゃダメでしょ

translation.en: (SIGHS) It's Sunday. You know what that means?
translation.ja: 今日は日曜だもの

translation.en: Family time, and we're all playing board games! But...
translation.ja: 家族デーよ　ゲームして遊ぼ

translation.en: Mom, seriously, every turn?
translation.ja: ママ　早くして

translation.en: Hey, back off!
translation.ja: お黙り

translation.en: No. Okay! Family time is over.
translation.ja: やめた！　家族デーは終わり今から個人タイム

translation.en: It is now personal time. I'll be in my room.
translation.ja: やめた！　家族デーは終わり今から個人タイム 私は部屋へ

translation.en: Okay, dear. Have fun.
translation.ja: そう　楽しんでね

translation.en: I knew I could break her. Go. Huh?
translation.ja: まんまと追い払った　お行き

translation.en: Go see him!
translation.ja: 彼の所へ

translation.en: Oh, yeah!
translation.ja: そっか

translation.en: You rule! Thank you, Grammy.
translation.ja: ばあちゃん サイコー！

translation.en: Hey! Ted, right?
translation.ja: テッドだね？

translation.en: Um, Mr. O'Hare?
translation.ja: オヘアさん？

translation.en: So, I hear you have become interested in trees.
translation.ja: 生きた木に興味があるんだって？

translation.en: What's that all about?
translation.ja: なぜだ？

translation.en: Where did you hear that?
translation.ja: どこで それを？

translation.en: Teddy, there's not much that goes on in Thneedville that I don't know about.
translation.ja: この町のことはすべて お見通しさ

translation.en: Here's the deal, I make a living selling fresh air to people.
translation.ja: いいか私は空気を売って稼いでる

translation.en: Trees? They make it for free.
translation.ja: だが木が作る空気はタダ

translation.en: So, when I hear people talking about them,
translation.ja: だから木の話を聞くと―

translation.en: I consider it kind of a threat to my business.
translation.ja: 脅威を感じてしまうんだよ

translation.en: I don't even know what you're talking about.
translation.ja: 一体 何の話？

translation.en: You listen to me, boy.
translation.ja: よく聞け　小僧

translation.en: Don't go poking around in things you don't understand
translation.ja: 身の程知らずが首を突っ込むな

translation.en: or I'll be your worst nightmare.
translation.ja: 悪夢を見るぞ

translation.en: I'm Frankenstein's head on a spider's body!
translation.ja: 私の頭はフランケン体はクモだ！

translation.en: Okay, my mom is expecting me. So, I'm just going to...
translation.ja: ママが待ってるから

translation.en: Of course, of course. Now, go back to your family game time.
translation.ja: そうだったな 家族デーのゲームに戻れ

translation.en: Grandma just finished her turn.
translation.ja: ばあちゃんの番も終わった

translation.en: How did you know?
translation.ja: なぜ それを？

translation.en: Please. I have eyes everywhere.
translation.ja: 至る所に目があるのさ

translation.en: You got a beautiful town here, Ted.
translation.ja: ここは すばらしい町だ

translation.en: Lots of fun stuff to occupy your short attention span.
translation.ja: 新しい娯楽も次々に現れるし―

translation.en: Why, I can't think of any reason
translation.ja: 飽きる理由がない

translation.en: you would ever want to go outside of town again.
translation.ja: だから町の外へ出ていこうなんて思うなよ

translation.en: Ever.
translation.ja: 二度と

translation.en: Okay! Good talk. Really good talk.
translation.ja: よし 楽しかったよ　君と話せて

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.ja: そうだ

translation.en: Look out!
translation.ja: 危ない！

translation.en: Hey, man? You know, you need to change that door bell.
translation.ja: ねえ　呼び鈴替えた方がいいよ

translation.en: Oh, you missed me. What?
translation.ja: 会いたかったか

translation.en: You're already back. Clearly, you missed me a little. Right?
translation.ja: もう戻ってきた私に会いたくて だろ？

translation.en: No, I didn't. I'm just here to hear the end of the story.
translation.ja: 違うよ　話の続きが聞きたいだけだ

translation.en: Why are you so interested in trees anyway?
translation.ja: なぜ木に こだわる？

translation.en: Why aren't you like other kids,
translation.ja: ほかの子は踊ったり―

translation.en: break dancing and wearing bell-bottoms,
translation.ja: ベルボトムを穿(は)いたり―

translation.en: and playing the Donkey Kongs?
translation.ja: ドンキーコングで遊んでる

translation.en: (LAUGHS) Yeah, right, right. I don't know.
translation.ja: 古い… どうかな　僕はただ―

translation.en: Uh, I just thought it would be kind of cool to have one, you know?
translation.ja: どうかな　僕はただ― 木があると いいなって

translation.en: Huh?
translation.ja: 木があると いいなって

translation.en: It's a girl, isn't it?
translation.ja: 女のためだな？

translation.en: What? No!
translation.ja: 何だって？　違うよ

translation.en: Really? Because when a guy does something stupid once,
translation.ja: そうかな？ 男はバカをやるもんだが―

translation.en: well, that's because he's a guy.
translation.ja: 男はバカをやるもんだが―

translation.en: But if he does the same stupid thing twice,
translation.ja: 同じバカを２度やるのは―

translation.en: it's usually to impress some girl.
translation.ja: その辺の女の 気を引くためさ

translation.en: Hey, she is not some girl! She's a woman, in high school.
translation.ja: 彼女は その辺の女じゃない高校のレディだ

translation.en: And she loves trees. And I'm going to get her one. Aw!
translation.ja: 木が大好きだからプレゼントしたい

translation.en: How nice to see someone so undeterred by things like reality.
translation.ja: 現実を無視できる奴って感動的だよ

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.ja: 現実を無視できる奴って感動的だよ どうも

translation.en: All right, but where did we leave off?
translation.ja: どこまで話した？

translation.en: Now that's a Thneed.
translation.ja: ついに スニードの完成

translation.en: Nothing unmanly about knitting. No, sir.
translation.ja: 男が編み物をして何が悪い？

translation.en: Oh!
translation.ja: 何やってんだ

translation.en: Who taught you guys how to steal a bed?
translation.ja: ベッドも盗めんのか

translation.en: Okay, nice and easy.
translation.ja: そっとじゃ

translation.en: Nice work, you guys. Couldn't have done it without you.
translation.ja: よくやった　でかしたぞ

translation.en: You got to be kidding me. Can he swim?
translation.ja: ピップスクィークめ

translation.en: Of course he can't swim!
translation.ja: 彼は泳げるか？ 溺れちまう

translation.en: Hang on, Pipsqueak! I'm coming to get you!
translation.ja: 頑張れ　すぐ助ける！

translation.en: Hey, you fishies! Stop that bed!
translation.ja: 魚たち　ベッドを止めろ

translation.en: Jump, jump!
translation.ja: 登れ

translation.en: Come on, get up there. Come on.
translation.ja: しならせろ

translation.en: Go, go! A little bit more! A little bit more!
translation.ja: 早く もう少しじゃ

translation.en: Now what?
translation.ja: あとは？

translation.en: Okay, Pipsqueak, give me your hand. Come on, reach out for the Lorax.
translation.ja: ピップスクィーク手を伸ばせ

translation.en: (HUMMING)
translation.ja: 大変じゃ

translation.en: Hey, Beanpole, wake up!
translation.ja: ひょろ長　起きろ！

translation.en: What's happening? Where am I?
translation.ja: 何だ？　ここは？

translation.en: Hey! We got trouble, and it's coming up fast!
translation.ja: 何だ？　ここは？ 大変じゃ　急流に入る！

translation.en: We're in a river!
translation.ja: 川だ！

translation.en: Just do something!
translation.ja: 何とかしてよ！

translation.en: Help is on the way!
translation.ja: 助けてやる！

translation.en: (GRUNTING)
translation.ja: すぐじゃ！

translation.en: (EXHALING) Yuck!
translation.ja: 起きろ

translation.en: Ah!
translation.ja: クリア！

translation.en: I was heading into the light, and you pulled me right back and here I am!
translation.ja: あの世の入口で引き戻されたよ

translation.en: You saved my life!
translation.ja: あの世の入口で引き戻されたよ 君は命の恩人だ！

translation.en: Yeah, I know. Well, no, it's not that big a deal.
translation.ja: 君は命の恩人だ！ いいさ　どうってことない

translation.en: It is a big deal!
translation.ja: いいさ　どうってことない

translation.en: Look, I almost went over that waterfall! Wait...
translation.ja: あるよ　もう少しで滝を真っ逆さま… 待てよ

translation.en: On my bed. How did my bed get in the river?
translation.ja: なんでベッドが川へ？

translation.en: Uh... About that...
translation.ja: なんでベッドが川へ？ そのことだが…

translation.en: Actually... I put your bed in the water.
translation.ja: そのことだが… 実は― わしが流した

translation.en: I just wanted to calmly float you away.
translation.ja: 悪気はないただ穏便に去ってほしかった

translation.en: Look, everyone here needs the trees and you're chopping them down!
translation.ja: 森の住人の大切な木を君は伐り倒そうとしとる

translation.en: So, we've got a big problem.
translation.ja: わしらには大問題じゃ

translation.en: I hereby swear that I will never chop down another tree.
translation.ja: 分かった 約束するよもう二度と木は伐らない

translation.en: I promise.
translation.ja: 誓います

translation.en: Thank you. But I'm going to keep my eye on you.
translation.ja: ありがとうだが見張っておるぞ

translation.en: Good. Now, I've got a big day tomorrow
translation.ja: ありがとうだが見張っておるぞ いいともじゃ 朝が早いから寝るよ

translation.en: so I'm going to get some sleep.
translation.ja: いいともじゃ 朝が早いから寝るよ

translation.en: Right after I find my bed. (ELECTRICITY CRACKLING)
translation.ja: ベッド 捜さなきゃ

translation.en: Question, what are they doing here?
translation.ja: なぜ皆がいるの？

translation.en: And follow up, if I may, what are you doing here?
translation.ja: それから もう１つ

translation.en: Well, after the incident last night,
translation.ja: あんたも なぜだ？ 昨夜 君が落としてった―

translation.en: we found one of your socks and came here to return it.
translation.ja: 昨夜 君が落としてった― 靴下を返しにきたんじゃ

translation.en: But when we got here, you were asleep. What?
translation.ja: 靴下を返しにきたんじゃ でも君は眠っておった

translation.en: Ew!
translation.ja: でも君は眠っておった

translation.en: Exactly. And sleeping is the body's way
translation.ja: それを見て思わなかったのか

translation.en: of telling other people to go away.
translation.ja: それを見て思わなかったのか “帰らなきゃ”って

translation.en: I know, but you looked so cozy.
translation.ja: “帰らなきゃ”って でも ぬくぬくと快適そうだし―

translation.en: And it was cold outside, and we just fell asleep. No harm done.
translation.ja: 外は寒かったもんで つい…害はない

translation.en: "No harm done"? "No harm done"? Okay.
translation.ja: 外は寒かったもんで つい…害はない “害はない”だって？よく言うよ

translation.en: Okay, I put my lips on those. Well, I used to, anyway. (GRUNTING)
translation.ja: 僕のカップなのに…“カップだった”だ

translation.en: Did you just... In my bowl!
translation.ja: 産卵？

translation.en: Why do you have one of these? You don't even have a mustache.
translation.ja: なぜヒゲもないのにヒゲ･ブラシを？

translation.en: Okay, that's it!
translation.ja: ここまでだ　帰れ

translation.en: What? I thought we made a deal last night.
translation.ja: ここまでだ　帰れ 昨夜 約束したろ？

translation.en: Yes, we did.
translation.ja: 昨夜 約束したろ？

translation.en: And I said I wouldn't chop down any more trees.
translation.ja: したとも木は伐らないってね

translation.en: And I said I was going to keep an eye on you.
translation.ja: したとも木は伐らないってね わしは見張ると言った

translation.en: I'm starving. What's for breakfast?
translation.ja: わしは見張ると言った 腹ペコだ　朝食は？

translation.en: (GRUNTS)
translation.ja: 朝食は延期じゃ

translation.en: You know what? I got work to do. Yeah.
translation.ja: そうだ　僕 仕事しなきゃ

translation.en: I got to go into town and sell my Thneed.
translation.ja: そうだ　僕 仕事しなきゃ 町へ行って売るんだこのスニードをね

translation.en: (LAUGHS)
translation.ja: 町へ行って売るんだこのスニードをね

translation.en: You chopped down one of my trees to make that piece of garbage? Look at that...
translation.ja: そんなボロのために木を伐ったのか？

translation.en: "Garbage"? Oh, no. Oh, no! You do not get it.
translation.ja: ボロ？ 違う　君は分かってない

translation.en: This is a revolutionary product
translation.ja: 違う　君は分かってない これは革命的な製品だ

translation.en: that will change the world as we know it.
translation.ja: これは革命的な製品だ 世界を変える

translation.en: It has a million uses!
translation.ja: 世界を変える

translation.en: Look at this. It's a swimsuit!
translation.ja: 用途は無限大 たとえば 水着に

translation.en: Mud tracked all over your floor by uninvited guests?
translation.ja: 招かれざる客の足跡も―

translation.en: Well, the Thneed sure comes in handy for that!
translation.ja: 招かれざる客の足跡も― スニードならサッと ひと拭きこの通り

translation.en: But wait, there's more!
translation.ja: スニードならサッと ひと拭きこの通り

translation.en: Thanks to its all-natural microfibers,
translation.ja: まだある 自然素材のマイクロファイバーは吸収力 抜群

translation.en: the Thneed is super-absorbent! It also works as a hat.
translation.ja: 自然素材のマイクロファイバーは吸収力 抜群

translation.en: Of course, you probably want to wring it out first.
translation.ja: 水は絞ってね

translation.en: Go ahead, knock yourself out.
translation.ja: 水は絞ってね 売れるもんなら売れ

translation.en: But nobody is going to buy that thing.
translation.ja: 誰も買わんよ

translation.en: Good to know.
translation.ja: 誰も買わんよ 忠告をどうも

translation.en: Well, fortunately, you are not the target market, weirdo.
translation.ja: 忠告をどうも でも あんたは客じゃないヘンなおじさん

translation.en: You're bringing a guitar?
translation.ja: でも あんたは客じゃないヘンなおじさん ギターを？

translation.en: Oh, yeah. I got a little jingle.
translation.ja: ギターを？ ジングルを奏でて―

translation.en: I'm gonna blow some minds, gonna sell some Thneeds!
translation.ja: ジングルを奏でて― 買う気を くすぐるのさスニードのね

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: 買う気を くすぐるのさスニードのね

translation.en: (SINGING) Everybody needs a Thneed
translation.ja: 皆のニーズに　　応えるスニード

translation.en: A fine thing that all people...
